data.message: PLEASE, I do NOT want to see everything my friends like or comment on in my news feed.  I just want to see their own status updates, not what they like or are commenting on complete strangers' profiles.  PLEASE PLEASE do something about this.   My news feed is getting ridiculous.

replies.message: Hey Jenny. You can use "See First" to select a person or Page and their posts will appear at the top of your News Feed. You can learn how to select friends to "See First" here: http://on.fb.me/1NMxw54.  Thanks for reaching out today. -Kristin

It's not just us seeing everything others like or comment on... I don't want everything I like or comment on to be shared with my entire friends list. I feel like I can't like and support friends with a like because of what other friends or family will think.
